panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page

targets.expr:
sum by (relname) (pg_table_idx_scan{ins="$ins", datname="$datname"}) 
+ sum by (relname) (pg_table_seq_scan{ins="$ins", datname="$datname"})

links.title: PGSQL Session : PG Conn Usage for ${ins}.${datname}
PGSQL Persist : Block Hit Ratio for ${ins}
PGSQL Session : PGB Conn Usage for ${ins}.${datname}

panels.description: Database in Pgbouncer of this instance ${ins}

targets.expr: sum by (datname) (pgbouncer_database_current_connections{ins="$ins", datname!="pgbouncer"}) / sum by (datname) (pgbouncer_database_max_connections{ins="$ins", datname!="pgbouncer"})

panels.title: Databases in Pgbouncer

panels.description: Time spent on executing statements  during last 1 hour
panels.title: Query by Time (1h)

panels.description: number of statement call in last 1 hour
panels.title: Query by Call (1h)

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
